javascript_required.title: Oops! No JavaScript, no fun!
javascript_required.desc: Looks like you tried to play Pong in the 1990s. Please enable JavaScript and let's party!

error.html5_required: Uh-oh! HTML5 is having a nap. Please wake it up and come back!
error.missing_text: Whoops! Some text is lost in the void. Can you help us find it?

title.login: Log in to the Epic Adventure

button.chat_on: Stir up a storm of words!

welcome_page.title: Welcome to our Pong-tropolis,
welcome_page.desc_1: Prepare yourself for a world where paddles rule, balls fly, and champions rise!
welcome_page.desc_2: Choose your gamemode, and let the epic saga begin. It's not just a game; it's a lifestyle.
welcome_page.gamemodes: Game Modes: Offline, Online, or Tournament of Eternal Glory

error.known_user: This username is already in use.
error.invalid_totp: The TOTP code entered is invalid.
error.server_error: An internal server error occurred. Please try again later.
error.unknown_error: An unknown error occurred. Please contact support.
error.ft_api_error: An error occurred while communicating with the 42 API.
error.invalid_account_type: This account type is not allowed for authentication.

qrcode.title: QR code for setting up Two-Factor Authentication (TOTP) in an authenticator app.

error.reserved_username: Usernames ending in '42' are reserved for 42 authentication. Please choose a different one.
error.server_error: Server error, please try again later

chat.blocked: You cannot send messages to this user.
chat.user_unknown: The specified user could not be found.
chat.unknown_id: The provided ID does not match any records.
chat.help:
/mp <username> <msg>
- Send a private message to another connected user.
/(un)block <username>
- Block or unblock a user to no see theyr message.
/invite <username>
- Invite specified user to a pong game.
chat.unauthenticated: You need to log in to access this feature.
chat.invalid_type: Message type is required but was not provided.
chat.invalid_token: The provided token is invalid or expired.
chat.authenticated: You are successfully logged in to the chat.
chat.server_error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
chat.pong_invite: You have been invited to a game of Pong!

pong_offline.title: Pong ‚Äì No WiFi Required!
pong_offline.desc: Play against the mighty Dave or your pet hamster (they're surprisingly good).

pong_online.title: Pong ‚Äì Battle for the Digital Throne!
pong_online.desc: Connect with your friends to show off your skills, or at least your ability to hit a ball.

pong_tournament.title: The Pongocalypse Tournament
pong_tournament.desc: Only the strongest Pong players will survive! Will you be the chosen one or just another statistic?

pong_crazy.title: Crazy pong
pong_crazy.desc: A wacky twist on classic Pong! Experience unpredictable ball movements and chaotic gameplay that keeps you on your toes.
